title: Blackburn Spending: Year-by-Year Trends and What They Reveal
summary: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council's spending increased by £214.4M (161.3%) from 2020 to 2025.
author: Blackburn Council Transparency

title: Red Flags in Blackburn's Spending: What DOGE Analysis Found
summary: The total spend analysed by AI DOGE is £1732.6M across 492,973 transactions.
author: Blackburn Council Transparency

title: Inside Blackburn's Departments: Where Every Pound Goes
summary: The Adults and Prevention Services department has the largest budget, with a total spend of £412.4M, accounting for 23.8% of the council's total expenditure.
author: Blackburn Council Transparency

title: Where Blackburn's Money Really Goes: Top Supplier Analysis 2026
summary: The top 5 suppliers to Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council account for £469.9M, which is 27.1% of the total spend.
author: Blackburn Council Transparency

title: Blackburn with Darwen: £1.7 Billion Across 492,973 Transactions
summary: Blackburn with Darwen's spending data spans six years and 6,082 suppliers. HMRC dominates at 10% of all spend, inflating concentration scores, while procurement publication delays averaging 69.8 days are the slowest in Lancashire.
author: Blackburn with Darwen Transparency
